In Oct 9 or 11, you will present the literature review to the class. Each presentation will be about 12 minutes, with 1-3 minutes for discussion. This presentation slides should be a concise, professional presentation in PowerPoint or PDF that includes: Title of paper being reviewed, Introduction, goals of paper, methods and results, Future work (What needs to be done next? What improvements can
